content.raw: @rmerriam, the docker build command we're running does not take the `-f` argument so the repo needs a top level `Dockerfile`. If your code looking for the sim's ros master? In that case, you can remove the `ENV ROS_MASTER_URI`, I think that was added in scpeters' Dockerfile as an example of starting a local roscore.
content.html: @rmerriam, the docker build command we're running does not take the -f argument so the repo needs a top level Dockerfile. If your code looking for the sim's ros master? In that case, you can remove the ENV ROS_MASTER_URI, I think that was added in scpeters' Dockerfile as an example of starting a local roscore.
